TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of horizontal alignments available to text and images.
Docs.remarks: An enumeration of valid horizontal alignment values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment Center = int64(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the content will be horizontally centered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment Fill = int64(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the content will fill the control, stretching and wrapping as necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment Leading = int64(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the content will be horizontally aligned from the leading edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment Left = int64(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the content will be horizontally aligned from the left edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment Right = int64(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the content will be horizontally aligned from the right edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype UIKit.UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment Trailing = int64(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the content will be horizontally aligned from the trailing edge.
